alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Collier and southeastern Hendry Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Montura to 11 miles northwest of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendry Correctional and Big Cypress Seminole Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
